data.name: RPG Maker VX Ace - Light Novel Standard Music Vol.2
data.detailed_description:
Bring your tale to life! From Bitter Sweet Entertainment comes their second music pack which includes BGMs for use in your light-novel game.

Provided in both mp3 and ogg formats, this pack includes:

42 BGM tracks

Includes (ogg / mp3):

1. LNSM2_BGM01_Theme1
2. LNSM2_BGM02_Theme2
3. LNSM2_BGM03_Theme3
4. LNSM2_BGM04_Theme4
5. LNSM2_BGM05_Theme5
6. LNSM2_BGM06_Theme6

data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Italian, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
